lead_paragraph: Disgraced world soccer president Sepp Blatter and the sport's European head, Michel Platini, will be invited to the 2018 World Cup in Russia, Russian Sports Minister Vitaly Mutko said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Russia Says Blatter, Platini to Be Invited to World Cup
headline.main: Russia Says Blatter, Platini to Be Invited to World Cup

snippet: Disgraced world soccer president Sepp Blatter and the sport's European head, Michel Platini, will be invited to the 2018 World Cup in Russia, Russian Sports Minister Vitaly Mutko said on Monday....
